<< nelsonappid Core nfilename >>

nelsonroot

Returns Nelson's root folder.

Syntax

nelson_path = nelsonroot

Output argument

nelson_path

a string: the root folder of Nelson.

Description

nelsonroot returns the root folder of Nelson.

Example

pwd
cd(nelsonroot)
pwd

See also

pwd, cd.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
